meanings.definition: Not created; existing without having been created.
meanings.sent1: The uncreate universe seemed to stretch on forever.
meanings.sent2: The artist admired the uncreate beauty of the untouched landscape.
meanings.sent3: The uncreate painting was simply a blank canvas.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was an uncreate realm of endless possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The uncreate concept of timelessness fascinated him.

meanings.sent1: She hoped to uncreate a new recipe for the bake-off.
meanings.sent2: The magician could uncreate a dove out of thin air.
meanings.sent3: He tried to uncreate a robot but ended up with a toaster.
meanings.sent4: The author's words could uncreate entire worlds in the reader's mind.
meanings.sent5: The chef's goal was to uncreate a dish that would surprise and delight.
